oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Majmūʻah fī ʻilm al-raml : manuscript, undated
Nujūm wa-raml
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A collection of writings by various authors on divination and geomancy.

Zāyirjat Abī al-ʻAbbās al-Khazrajī Aḥmad al-Sabtī (ff. 1v-5r) -- Sharḥ Zāyirjat al-Imām al-Quṭb Abū al-ʻAbbās / Aḥmad al-Sabtī (ff. 5r-9v) -- Kitāb al-Sirr al-maknūn wa-al-ʻilm al-makhzūn fī ʻilm al-raml / Naṣīr al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī (ff. 9v-21v) -- Sharḥ al-dāʼirah wa-yalīhā urjūzah wa-sharḥ li-ikhrāj al-kunūz al-makhfīyah / Abū al-Khayr (ff. 28r-55v) -- Khāfīyah fī ʻilm al-ḥurūf / Ḥajīj ibn Qāsim al-Waḥīdī (ff. 56r-62v) -- ʻAjāʼib al-makhlūqāt / Aḥmad ʻAli ibn Zanbīl al-Maḥallī al-Munajjim (ff. 90v-163v).
Written in one column with paragraphs in two columns, 14 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper. 20.4 x 15 cm. (14-15 x 9-9.5 cm.).
Bound. Marbled paper over board. Brown leather over spine.
MS Arab 263. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Divination
Geomancy
Islamic occultism
